pages.text:
WWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWW
Skeletons are common undead found in many places. Skeletons are thought to be
resurrected from long-dead adventurers and other creatures. How this skeleton is then capable of locomotion is still up for debate, and the study of skeletons is highly complicated and sought after.

accidentally hit other creatures in the way. Because of this, skeletons will frequently incite infighting among other monsters. Skeletons, like other undead, burn in daylight. Skeletons tend to reside underground and leave during the night. In theory, skeletons might be found anywhere that adventurers died long ago.
